title: Letters to the Editor:  Odd Investment for Such a  Prominent Climate Activist
text:
"Bill Gates, Other Investors Spend $4.7 Billion for Private-Jet Firm" (Business News, Feb. 6) doesn't mention the irony of Mr. Gates's making such an investment in light of his climate-change activism and the fact that private jets produce many times the amount of carbon per passenger than do commercial aircraft.

Julius L. Loeser

Chicago
